meanings.definition: The sheath of connective tissue surrounding a bundle of nerve fibers.
meanings.sent1: The perineurium provides a protective layer around nerve bundles.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the perineurium to understand its role in nerve function.
meanings.sent3: The perineurium decided to throw a party for the nerve fibers.
meanings.sent4: The perineurium was like a knight guarding the precious nerve fibers.
meanings.sent5: The perineurium resembled a cozy blanket hugging the nerve bundle tightly.

meanings.definition: The protective covering of nerves within the peripheral nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Injuries to the perineurium can affect nerve function.
meanings.sent2: The perineurium shields the nerves from external damage.
meanings.sent3: The perineurium nervously checked if all nerves were safe and sound.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the perineurium, always safeguarding his nerves.
meanings.sent5: The perineurium acted as a vigilant guard, ensuring the nerves' well-being.
